template_reference.name: exts
template_reference.comment: Make sure the building and moving building are referencing the same schema, if they are using different schemas unpacking will break.

instance_reference.name: attachments
instance_reference.comment:
Outskirts go here. Removed until a fix for selection is in. To add back, copy and paste the following into this field:
<instance_reference name="attachments" value="attachments\attachment_lists\civilizations\mongol\outskirts\general\mon_towncenter_01" />

template_reference.name: district_bonus
template_reference.comment:
Ovoo district bonus.
Production buildings can produce double units at the cost of stone.
Upgrade bonus at the cost of stone.

instance_reference.name: attachments
instance_reference.comment:

<instance_reference name="attachments" value="attachments\attachment_lists\civilizations\mongol\outskirts\general\mon_towncenter_01" />

template_reference.name: district_bonus
template_reference.comment:
Ovoo district bonus.
Production buildings can produce double units at the cost of stone.
Upgrade bonus at the cost of stone.

template_reference.name: district_bonus
template_reference.comment:
Stupa specialization bonus (Monasteries grant the Ovoo bonus).
Production buildings can produce double units at the cost of stone.
Upgrade bonus at the cost of stone.
